answer: Sign up for SMSHUB website and read the corresponding instruction on the main page. Ifnecessary, ask questions, there is a contact bot - @smshub_agent_bot

Prepare the technical base: install provided 
 software and connect the equipment to your 
 SIM cards. Face any difficulties? Our manager 
is always in touch.

Replace cards in time, get profit and withdraw 
 funds in any convenient way.
